easy.q: I have a tail but no body. I can be curled or straight, and I help you draw a line. What am I?
easy.hint: Often used for writing and drawing.

medium.q: I come in pairs, but I am not shoes. My letters pair up to spell a word; change one letter and I change colors. What am I?
medium.hint: Focus on weather and color wordplay.
